item.title: Denzel Washington through the years
item.description: Denzel Washington spoke with 60 Minutes three times throughout his career. Dig into the archives with the latest episode of "60 Minutes: A Second Look...

item.title: Proposal would allow Bible teachings in Texas public grade schools
item.description: Texas public elementary schools could use teachings from the Bible in lessons under a proposal drawing intense opposition and praise.

item.title: Arthur Frommer, famed travel guide innovator, has died at 95
item.description: Arthur Frommer, whose "Europe on 5 Dollars a Day" guidebooks revolutionized leisure travel by persuading average Americans to take budget vacations ab...

item.title: Newsom to allow District Attorney-elect Nathan Hochman to lead Menendez
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom decided to defer the Menendez brothers' clemency decision to incoming District Attorney Nathan Hochman.

item.title: Judge strikes down Wyoming abortion laws
item.description: A judge has struck down Wyoming's overall ban on abortion and its first-in-the nation explicit prohibition on the use of medication to end pregnancy.
